sect2.title: Introduction
sect2.para: Group chat feature supports us to customize Group chat header, Group chat name, Confirgured role list for each process.

sect2.title: Customize group chat header
sect2.para: Override group chat title/header via the "groupChatHeader" CMS entry.

listitem.para: Introduce an Axon.ivy project which has PortalTemplate as a required library.
Override the SetGroupChatName process to customize the group chat name, follow its notes to change the group chat name.
If you have the parameters which are not available in GroupChat.java, override the GetGroupChatParams callable process and follow its note.

sect2.title: Customize predefined responsible roles
sect2.para: Override the AssignRolesGroupChat process to customize the predefined responsible roles, follow its notes to configure.
